records.browseQuery: SELECT `actual_payments`.`id` AS `primarykey`, `identity_name`, `msisdn`, `trx_id`, `trx_date`, `paid_in` FROM `actual_payments` WHERE `trx_id` NOT IN (SELECT `trx_id` FROM `payment` GROUP BY `trx_id`) ORDER BY `actual_payments`.`id` DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `rowCount` FROM `actual_payments` WHERE `trx_id` NOT IN (SELECT `trx_id` FROM `payment` GROUP BY `trx_id`) ORDER BY `actual_payments`.`id` DESC
